fxInfo_label: Is chief executive a military officer?
fxInfo_notes: If chief executives were described as officers with no indication of formal retirement when they assumed office, they are always listed as offcers for the duration of their term. If chief executives were formally retired military officers upon taking office, then this variable gets a 0.
fxInfo_question: Is chief executive a military officer?

fxInfo_responses.value: if the source (Europa or Banks) includes a rank in their title.

name: e_dpi_cemo
